articles.title: More tragedy befalls family: Yu Tian suffers stroke as 38-year-old singer daughter's cancer spreads throughout body - AsiaOne

articles.title: Taufik Batisah, Rui En among performers at Gardens by the Bay and Mediacorp's National Day Concert 2022 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The concert is returning to the Gardens' grounds after two years on Aug 6 at the Supertree Grove and will see a host of local artistes showcasing their talents.
articles.content:
